ComicInfo.Series: The Steam Engines of Oz: The Geared Leviathan
ComicInfo.Summary: While the mysterious twins further their master plan, Victoria, Phadrig, and Bess the Munchkin find themselves under the gaze of the biggest, baddest, and Cowardliest Lion of them all - and he's not happy about it. What secrets does he hold in his massive skull which can help locate Phadrig's sons, and how will all of their paths intersect? More secret histories, revelations, and a rampaging monster of mechanized magic and menace.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Two
